chunk:
ClearStem Skincare Hydraberry Moisture Mask

Brand: ClearStem Skincare

Category: Mask

Ingredients: Water/Aqua, Propanediol, Squalane (Olive), Glycerin, Cetearyl Alcohol, Ethylhexyl Olivate, Polyglyceryl-6 Distearate, Raphanus Sativux (Radish) Seed Extract, Isopentyldiol, Butylene Glycol, Arnica Montana (Arnica Flower) Extract, Camellia Sinensis (

Camellia Sinensis (Tea Leaf) Extract, Argania Spinosa Sprout Cell Extract, Salix Nigra (Willow) Bark Extract., Cannabis Sativa (Hemp) Seed Oil*, Punica Granatum (Pomegranate) Seed Oil, Trifolium Pratense (Clover) Flower Extract, Alteromonas Ferment Extract, Aloe Barbadensis (Aloe Vera) Leaf Extract*, Sodium Hyaluronate, Curcuma Longa (Turmeric) Ro

Longa (Turmeric) Root Extract*, Jojoba Esters, Lactobacillus Ferment, Hibiscus Sabdariffa Fruit Extract, Cetyl Alcohol, Diglucosyl Gallic Acid, Xanthan Gum, Alpha Lipoic Acid, Erythritol, Polylysine, Vaccinium Angustifolium (Blueberry) Fruit Extract, Mentha Piperita (Peppermint) Oil, Caprylhydroxamic Acid, 1,2-Hexanediol

Ingredient concerns: HIGH
dient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
